shorts.title: Climbers trade ropes for trash, help NEPA wilderness
shorts.title_distilled: Climbers trade ropes for trash, help NEPA wilderness.
shorts.description: CONYNGHAM TOWNSHIP, LUZERNE COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — It's not every day you see a group of rock climbers trading their ropes for trash bags, but a local group is doing just that, helping Pennsylvania's wilderness for generations to come. What do rock climbing and litter have in common? For some climbers, a whole lot more than [...]
shorts.content: CONYNGHAM TOWNSHIP, LUZERNE COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — It's not every day you see a group of rock climbers trading their ropes for trash bags, but a local group is doing just that, helping Pennsylvania's wilderness for generations to come. What do rock climbing and litter have in common? For some climbers, a whole lot more than [...]
shorts.content_distilled: CONYNGHAM TOWNSHIP, LUZERNE COUNTY  — It's not every day you see a group of rock climbers trading their ropes for trash bags, but a local group is doing just that, helping Pennsylvania's wilderness for generations to come.

shorts.description: SCRANTON, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — A shakeup on the Lackawanna County Commissioner's Board could be just hours away. shorts.description: DUNMORE, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — There was some Bingo with a Halloween twist on Sunday.
